description.narrative: GIZ will develop the capacity of national institutions linked to technical and vocational education in the tourism and hospitality industry. This includes developing occupational standards, competency based curricula, ToT modules, quality assurance processes, accreditation and certification. It also includes capacity development of key industry and regulatory institutions that support or interact with the TVET system.

participating-org.narrative: Deutsche Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ) GmbH
